video_prompt: Woman adjusts weapon, then mounts futuristic motorcycle, accelerating forward. Jacket flutters, hair streams back, motorcycle lights pulse. Dynamic turns and speed.
image_prompt: A futuristic illustration: A confident woman with dark hair and blue angular sunglasses, wearing a white tank top, white denim shorts, and a blue cropped jacket, stands beside a sleek, sky-blue futuristic motorcycle with orange accents and a clear blue windshield. She casually rests her hand on the motorcycle and holds a weapon in her other hand. Her shoes are light blue metallic buckle pumps. The motorcycle has a bulky front covering a single wheel. Both are set against a stark white background with a clean, graphic novel aesthetic and bright, even lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Woman precisely adjusts her weapon, then swiftly mounts a futuristic motorcycle. It surges forward, jacket and hair whipping backward in the wind. Headlights pulsate rhythmically as the motorcycle executes rapid, high-speed turns.
